name: The Bark of Hope
description:
Hi, I'm Foxer and I hope you enjoy my first videogame called "The Bark of Hope". 
In it, I try to show certain moments or situations that somehow happened in my life.

Unfortunately, I have focused on sad passages. This does not mean that my next works will be developed with this theme, simply, I thought it was appropriate to do it in this way, taking into account the possibilities offered by the Bitsy platform.

I recommend playing the game with sad piano music in the background, such as Yiruma - River Flows in You.  I hope you enjoy it and that you leave me your comments.  Thank you!
